name: Plank
description: Maintain a straight stable position with arms directly under the shoulders and feet together. Keep the abdominal muscles tight without raising or lowering the hips.

name: Lunges
description: From a standing position take a big step forward with one leg and lower down until both knees form almost a 90-degree angle. Return to the starting position and repeat with the other leg.

name: Squat
description: From a standing position bend the knees and lower the buttocks as if you were going to sit in a chair keeping the back straight. Then return to the starting position.

name: Push-ups
description: In a prone position place hands on the ground wider than shoulder-width apart and lift the body until arms are fully extended keeping the body straight. Lower down until you almost touch the ground and then lift the body up again.

name: Crunches
description: Lie on your back with knees bent and feet flat on the floor. Lift the upper body towards the knees keeping the lower back on the ground.

name: Mountain Climbers
description: From a plank position rapidly alternate bringing knees to the chest simulating a running motion while prone.

name: Burpees
description: Stand up lower down into a squat position place hands on the ground and jump back into a plank position. Do a push-up then jump forward into a squat position and jump up with arms stretched toward the ceiling.

name: Russian Twist
description: Sit on the ground with knees bent lean the torso slightly backward without curving the back. Rotate the torso from side to side maintaining balance.

name: Superman
description: Lie face down extend arms and legs. Lift arms chest and legs off the ground simultaneously keeping only the pelvis in contact with the ground.

name: Jumping Jacks
description: Standing with legs together and arms at your sides jump to open your legs and raise your arms above your head simultaneously. Return to the starting position and repeat.

name: Bicycle Crunches
description: Lie on your back with hands behind your head and legs raised and bent at 90 degrees. Alternately bring your elbow to the opposite knee by twisting your body simulating a cycling motion.

name: Triceps Dips
description: Sit on the edge of a stable chair or bench. Place hands next to hips. Move your hips off the bench and bend elbows to lower your body. Straighten arms to lift your body back up.

name: Side Planks
description: Lie on your side with legs extended. Prop your body up on your forearm keeping your body in a straight line from head to feet. Hold the position. Repeat on the other side.

name: Reverse Lunges
description: Stand with feet hip-width apart. Step backward with one leg and lower your body until the front thigh is parallel to the floor. The back knee should nearly touch the ground. Return to the starting position and repeat with the other leg.

name: Wall Sits
description: Stand with your back against a wall walk your feet forward while sliding your back down the wall until your thighs are parallel to the ground. Hold this position as long as possible.

name: Tuck Jumps
description: Stand with your knees slightly bent then jump up bringing your knees to your chest while in mid-air. Land softly and repeat.

name: High Knees
description: Run in place while lifting your knees as high as possible aiming for your chest. Pump your arms to increase your heart rate.

name: Arm Circles
description: Stand with arms extended by the sides perpendicular to your torso. Slowly make circles with your arms starting small and making them larger over time.

name: Flutter Kicks
description: Lie on your back with legs extended. Lift the heels off the floor and rapidly kick up and down in a small fluttering motion.

name: Box Jumps
description: Stand in front of a sturdy box or platform. Jump onto the box with both feet at the same time and land softly. Step back down and repeat.

name: Flexi-Stretch Strides
description: March in place while emphasizing high knee lifts and extended toe touches to increase lower limb flexibility.

name: Lumbar Loosener
description: Gentle pelvic tilts performed lying down to alleviate lower back stiffness.

name: Rotary Shoulder Openers
description: Arm circles with incremental radiuses to enhance shoulder joint mobility.

name: Balancing Act
description: Stand on one foot while reaching outward with the opposite hand to improve balance and core stability.

name: Neck Nodders
description: Slowly nod head up and down then side to side to relieve tension in the cervical spine.

name: Pull ups
description: Pull your straight tense body upwards with a rowing motion until your chest touches the bar.

name: Deadlift
description: The deadlift is a movement in which your hips hinge backward to lower down and pick up a weighted barbell or kettlebell from the floor

name: Wrist Whirls
description: Extend arms forward and perform wrist circles to reduce wrist joint strain.

name: Ankle Arcs
description: Point and flex the feet then rotate ankles to maintain flexibility and reduce the risk of sprains.

name: Piriformis Press
description: Seated stretch where one ankle rests on the opposite knee gently press on the raised knee to stretch the piriformis muscle.

name: Gluteal Gallops
description: Step side to side in a squatting position to strengthen the gluteal muscles.

name: Pectoral Extensions
description: Interlace fingers behind the back and gently lift hands to stretch chest muscles.

name: Hamstring Hurdles
description: Sit with one leg extended reach toward the toes to stretch the hamstring of the straightened leg.

name: Quad Stretching
description: While standing pull one foot toward the buttocks to stretch the quadriceps.

name: Calf raises
description: Start with both feet on the ground near a wall or bench to hold on to. Lift your heel to go up onto your toes as high as you can.

name: Hip Helix
description: Stand and move hips in a circular motion to improve hip joint fluidity

name: Biceps Curls
description: Flex your bicep and try to raise the weight to your shoulder.

name: Side Lying Leg Lifts
description: Lay on your side and lift your top leg up and hold for 2 seconds.

name: Copenhagen Side Plank
description: Top leg stays on the top of a chair. The elbow touches the ground for support. Raise your bottom leg using the top one.
